On Fri, 14 Dec 2001, Cormac Mullally <Cormac.Mullally@...>
wrote:

> I can use
> SourceResourceLoader.getResourceAsStream(this.getClass(),"Name of
> file"); to get an InputStream to a file but I dot know how to get a
> File class from this.

If all you want to do is passing it to a SAX parser, getting the
InputStream is all you need to do.

Otherwise, you can use getResource instead of getResourceAsStream
which will hand you an URL, parsing the filename out of the URL's
external form isn't too hard.

Stefan
